short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'blockchain' with 'my butt' amongst other things.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You know Cloud to Butt, but now, introducing the revolutionary, decentralized Blockchain-to-Butt extension. Does what it says on the tin, with some bonus surprises.
